[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: Concat {
                left: Concat {
                    left: LiteralString {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            7,
                        ),
                        value: "foo",
                    },
                    span: Span(
                        1,
                        13,
                    ),
                    right: LiteralString {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            15,
                        ),
                        value: "bar",
                    },
                },
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    21,
                ),
                right: LiteralString {
                    span: Span(
                        1,
                        23,
                    ),
                    value: "baz",
                },
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                28,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
